DOC.brief_summary: Phase IV , randomize , double-masked , parallel-group clinical trial compare ocular tolerability steroid-induced intraocular pressure ( IOP ) effect Zylet wth TobraDex healthy volunteer , either product administer QID ( approximately 4-hour interval ) 28 day .
DOC.brief_title: Ocular Tolerance Intraocular Pressure ( IOP ) Effects Zylet Versus Tobradex
